text:
@RealJamesWoods Since we don’t know how the #Coronavirus was started, could it be a nefarious and deadly plot by China to hurt @POTUS re-election and help fellow Commie Bernie win by destabilizing the US and other nations economies?
🤔

Commie dictators don’t value lives much.
Just asking....
